Structs/ManifoldStruct.html.name: ManifoldStruct
Structs/ManifoldStruct.html.abstract: Contains details of a collision in the physics engine.

Protocols/PhysicsCollisionHandler.html.name: PhysicsCollisionHandler
Protocols/PhysicsCollisionHandler.html.abstract: Protocol making sure that the class designated to handle collisions can do so.

Classes/PhysicsWorld.html#/s:7Physics0A5.name: simulate(TimeSinceLastUpdate:)
Classes/PhysicsWorld.html#/s:7Physics0A5.abstract: calculates one step of the physics engine

Classes/PhysicsWorld.html#/s:7Physics0A5.name: setCollisionHandler(asObj:)
Classes/PhysicsWorld.html#/s:7Physics0A5.abstract: Set the class that should handle collisions processed by the physics engine

Classes/PhysicsWorld.html#/s:7Physics0A5.name: addNodes(collection:)
Classes/PhysicsWorld.html#/s:7Physics0A5.abstract: add a collection of SpriteKit nodes to PhysicsWorld

Classes/PhysicsWorld.html#/s:7Physics0A5.name: collision(withObject1:object2:)
Classes/PhysicsWorld.html#/s:7Physics0A5.abstract: Determine whether there is a collision between two objects.

Classes/PhysicsObject.html#/s:7Physics0A.name: node
Classes/PhysicsObject.html#/s:7Physics0A.abstract: The index of the object in the collection of PhysicsObjects in PhysicsWorld

Classes/PhysicsObject.html#/s:7Physics0A.name: setIndex(index:)
Classes/PhysicsObject.html#/s:7Physics0A.abstract: Set the index of the object in the PhysicsWorld collection of objects

Classes/PhysicsObject.html#/s:7Physics0A.name: updatePosition()
Classes/PhysicsObject.html#/s:7Physics0A.abstract: Updates the bounds of the physics object using the nodes position

Classes/PhysicsObject.html#/s:7Physics0A.name: velocityIsZero()
Classes/PhysicsObject.html#/s:7Physics0A.abstract: Determines if the objects functional velocity is zero

Classes/PhysicsObject.html#/s:7Physics0A.name: verticalVelocityIsZero()
Classes/PhysicsObject.html#/s:7Physics0A.abstract: whether a physics object’s vertical velocity is functionally zero

Classes/PhysicsObject.html#/s:7Physics0A.name: integrateForces(timeInterval:)
Classes/PhysicsObject.html#/s:7Physics0A.abstract: Integrate the forces applied to the object in this current simulation round.

Classes/PhysicsObject.html#/s:7Physics0A.name: integrateVelocity(timeInterval:)
Classes/PhysicsObject.html#/s:7Physics0A.abstract: Integrate the objects current velocities to calculate where the objects next position should be.

Classes/PhysicsCollision.html#/s:7Physic.name: init(withManifold:)
Classes/PhysicsCollision.html#/s:7Physic.abstract: initialises the object with the properties required

Classes/PhysicsCollision.html#/s:7Physic.name: positionalCorrection()
Classes/PhysicsCollision.html#/s:7Physic.abstract: Applies the normal force to the object and prevents it from vibrating.

Classes/PhysicsBody.html.name: PhysicsBody
Classes/PhysicsBody.html.abstract: Class representing the mathematical properties of the physics object

Classes/PhysicsObject.html.name: PhysicsObject
Classes/PhysicsObject.html.abstract: Class representing an object in the physics world

Classes/PhysicsWorld.html.name: PhysicsWorld
Classes/PhysicsWorld.html.abstract: Represents the world which physics simulations will be run in.
